name: Spicy Grilled Shrimp
keywords: garlic, lemon juice, shrimp, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 9 large cloves garlic, peeled and minced
10 pounds jumbo shrimp, in the shell

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the oil, lemon juice, garlic, pepper and Tabasco sauce. Divide between 2 large bowls. Place half of the shrimp in each bowl and toss with the marinade. Refrigerate overnight. Preheat a grill or broiler. Grill or broil the shrimp until just cooked through, about 1 1/2 minutes on each side. Season with salt.
